user_query: I'm planning a family trip to Germany and we want to explore the country by train. Can you suggest some train and public transport stations in Germany? Additionally, I would like to know the distance in miles between Birmingham, Alabama and Los Angeles, California. It would be helpful if you could recommend some family-friendly attractions in Los Angeles as well.

TaskList.description: Fetch train and public transport stations in Germany.
Calculate the distance in miles between Birmingham, Alabama and Los Angeles, California.
Recommend family-friendly attractions in Los Angeles.
